PIC Code/SecurityXPLSender.c
Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ///@file SecurityXPLSender.c
00002 ///@brief Sends all security xPL messages
00003 #include "TCPIP Stack/TCPIP.h"
00004 #include "xPL.h"
00005 #include "SecuritySystem.h"
00006 
00007 
00008 //*********************************************************************
00009 /**
00010 Adds a new xPL message into the queue for transmittion.
00011 Caller populates IsChangeFlagged flag on the zone and area that should be applied.
00012 Note: Additional values should be populated manually 
00013 
00014 @param TaskBuffered, type of xPL message that will be sent
00015 @result returns the task number used to populate additional task info
00016 */
00017 int addxPLMessage (TaskBuffers TaskBuffered) {
00018 
00019         int iCounter, Result;
00020 
00021         #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00022                 char TempString[3]; // used for debug only
00023                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"xPL message placed in queue \r\n  - task position");
00024                 uitoa(xPLTaskList.FreePosition,  TempString);
00025                 putsUART(TempString);
00026                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"\r\n");
00027         #endif
00028 
00029         // set new properties of the task
00030         xPLTaskList.Task[xPLTaskList.FreePosition].TaskBuffered = TaskBuffered;
00031         Result = xPLTaskList.FreePosition;
00032         xPLTaskList.Task[Result].TaskState = 0;
00033 
00034         // populate zone array from the current IsChangeFlagged values
00035         for(iCounter =0; iCounter < ZONECOUNT; iCounter++)
00036                  xPLTaskList.Task[xPLTaskList.FreePosition].FlaggedZones[iCounter] = ZoneConfig[iCounter].IsChangeFlagged;
00037 
00038         // populate area array from the current IsChangeFlagged values
00039         for(iCounter =0; iCounter < AREACOUNT; iCounter++)
00040                  xPLTaskList.Task[xPLTaskList.FreePosition].FlaggedAreas[iCounter] = AreaConfig[iCounter].IsChangeFlagged;
00041 
00042         ClearArmingFlags();
00043 
00044         // Increaments the Free position, ready for the next task.
00045         if (xPLTaskList.FreePosition < (XPLBUFFERSIZE-1))
00046                 xPLTaskList.FreePosition++;
00047         else if(xPLTaskList.FreePosition >= (XPLBUFFERSIZE-1))
00048                 xPLTaskList.FreePosition =0;
00049                 
00050 return Result;
00051 }
00052

00057 /*********************************************************************
00058  *********************************************************************
00059  The sending of messages
00060  *********************************************************************
00061  ********************************************************************/
00062         
00063 
00064 
00065 //*********************************************************************
00066  /** 
00067  
00068   Create and send the xPL message for a change in state within a zone. 
00069   This only covers Tamper, Trigger and normal events, not alarmed
00070   
00071   @param MessageType only support Tamper, Trigger and normal events
00072   @param TheZone
00073  */
00074  
00075 void SendZoneStateMsg (Zone_States MessageType, int TheZone) {
00076 
00077         char strZoneID[3];
00078         
00079         //Check if we have a MAC transmit port, if not then shit yourself
00080         if (!UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)) {
00081 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00082                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"#ERROR# SendZoneStateMsg, no MAC transmit port\r\n");
00083 #endif
00084         }
00085         else {
00086                 
00087                 itoa(TheZone, strZoneID);
00088 
00089                 // Generate xPL head with type security.zone
00090                 XPLSendHeader(xPL_STATUS, TRUE,Class_Security,Type_Zone);
00091                         
00092                         
00093                 if (MessageType == StateTrigger) {
00094                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "event=alert\nzone=");
00095                         UDPPutArray(strZoneID,strlen(strZoneID));
00096                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\n}\n");
00097 
00098                 }
00099                 else if (MessageType == StateTamper) {
00100                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "event=tamper\nzone=");
00101                         UDPPutArray(strZoneID,strlen(strZoneID));
00102                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\n}\n");
00103                         
00104                 }
00105                 else if (MessageType == StateNormal) {
00106                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "event=normal\nzone=");
00107                         UDPPutArray(strZoneID,strlen(strZoneID));
00108                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\n}\n");
00109                         
00110                 }
00111 
00112                 // Now transmit it.
00113                 UDPFlush();
00114 
00115         }//UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)
00116 }// SendZoneStateMsg
00117 
00118 //*********************************************************************
00119  /** 
00120  
00121   Create and send the xPL message for a change in state within a area. 
00122   This only covers Tamper, Trigger and normal events, not alarmed.
00123   This needs to be called until the result = 0
00124   
00125   @param MessageType only support Tamper, Trigger and normal events
00126   @param TheZone, yes zone to send area messages
00127   @param StartPoint, is the starting area, used to resume from previous point
00128   @result 0 = no message sent, 1 = message sent & must call again
00129  */
00130  
00131  
00132 int SendAreaStateMsg (Zone_States CurrentZoneState, int TheZone, int StartPoint) {
00133 
00134         int iCounter, TheArea;
00135         char TheAreaTxt[2];
00136         BOOL FirstArea = TRUE;
00137         BOOL UpdateRequired = FALSE;
00138 
00139 
00140         // Check to see if this zone is a member of any area(s), if not no update is required
00141         // if it we save the area id for later
00142         for (iCounter = StartPoint; iCounter <= AREACOUNT-1; iCounter++) {
00143                 if (isZoneMemberOfArea(TheZone, iCounter) == TRUE)  {
00144                         
00145                         // if tampered we only update the area state if the state is normal, triggered or tampered
00146                         if (CurrentZoneState == StateTamper) {
00147                                 if ((AreaConfig[iCounter].State == StateNormal) || (AreaConfig[iCounter].State == StateTrigger) || (AreaConfig[iCounter].State == StateTamper)) {
00148                                         UpdateRequired = TRUE;
00149                                         TheArea = iCounter;
00150                                         break; 
00151                                 }       
00152                         }       
00153                         
00154                         // if triggered we only update the area state if the state is normal or triggered
00155                         if (CurrentZoneState == StateTrigger) {
00156                                 if ((AreaConfig[iCounter].State == StateNormal) || (AreaConfig[iCounter].State == StateTrigger)) {
00157                                         UpdateRequired = TRUE;
00158                                         TheArea = iCounter;
00159                                         break; // \todo check this does not stop multiple areas from working
00160                                 }       
00161                         }       
00162                         
00163                         // if normal we only update is area is normal
00164                         if (CurrentZoneState == StateNormal) {
00165                                 if (AreaConfig[iCounter].State == StateNormal) {
00166                                         UpdateRequired = TRUE;
00167                                         TheArea = iCounter;
00168                                         break; 
00169                                 }       
00170                         }       
00171                         
00172                 }// isZoneMemberOfArea
00173         }// iCounter
00174 
00175         if (UpdateRequired == FALSE) {
00176                 // Do nothing
00177                 return 0;
00178         }
00179 
00180 
00181         //Send the message for this area
00182         if (!UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)) { //Check if we have a MAC transmit port, if not then shit yourself
00183 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00184                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"#ERROR# SendAreaStateMsg, no MAC transmit port\r\n");
00185 #endif
00186         }
00187 
00188         else {
00189                 // Generate xPL head with type security.zone
00190                 XPLSendHeader(xPL_STATUS, TRUE,Class_Security,Type_Area);
00191 
00192                 // Trigger event
00193                 if (CurrentZoneState == StateTrigger) 
00194                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "event=alert\narea=");
00195                 
00196                 // Tamper event
00197                 if (CurrentZoneState == StateTamper) 
00198                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "event=tamper\narea=");
00199                 
00200                 // Normal event
00201                 if (CurrentZoneState == StateNormal) 
00202                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "event=normal\narea=");
00203                 
00204                 itoa(TheArea, TheAreaTxt);
00205                 UDPPutArray(TheAreaTxt,strlen(TheAreaTxt));
00206         
00207                 // Now transmit it.
00208                 UDPFlush();
00209 
00210         }//UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)
00211 
00212 return ++TheArea;
00213 
00214 } // SendAreaStateMsg
00215 
00216 /*********************************************************************
00217  Function:        SendAlarmingMsg
00218  PreCondition:    None
00219  Input:           ZoneID
00220  Output:          None
00221  Side Effects:    None
00222  Overview:
00223 /// Create and send the xPL message for when the alarm is triggered
00224 /// \todo what should be in the panic message ??
00225  ********************************************************************/
00226 void SendAlarmingMsg (int TheZone) {
00227 
00228         BOOL isFirstZone = TRUE;
00229         char TempBuffer[3];
00230 
00231 
00232         //Check if we have a MAC transmit port, if not then shit yourself
00233         if (!UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)) {
00234 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00235                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"#ERROR# SendAlarmingMsg, no MAC transmit port\r\n");
00236 #endif
00237         }
00238         else {
00239 
00240                 //Generate xPL head with type security.gateway
00241                 XPLSendHeader(xPL_STATUS, TRUE,Class_Security,Type_Gateway);
00242                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "event=alarm");
00243                 if (TheZone != 99 ) { // Zone 99 is for Panic
00244                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\nzone-list=");
00245                         itoa(TheZone, TempBuffer);
00246                         UDPPutArray(TempBuffer,strlen(TempBuffer));
00247                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\narea-list=");
00248 
00249                         for (iCount = 0; iCount < AREACOUNT; iCount++) {
00250                                 if (isZoneMemberOfArea(TheZone, iCount) == TRUE) {
00251                                         if (!isFirstZone) UDPPut(',');
00252                                         isFirstZone = FALSE;
00253                                         UDPPut('0'+iCount);
00254                                 }// isZoneMemberOfArea
00255                         }// for iCount
00256 
00257                         //alarm-type=Alarm type of the zone triggered
00258                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\nalarm-type=");
00259                         iCount = ZoneConfig[TheZone].ZoneAlarmType;
00260                         UDPPutROMString(AlarmTypesText[iCount]);
00261 
00262                 } // TheZone != 99 ie Panic
00263 
00264 
00265 
00266                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\n}\n");
00267 
00268 
00269 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00270                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"SendAlarmingMsg Message Sent\r\n");
00271 
00272                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"Zone: ");
00273                 itoa(TheZone, xPLMsgKey);
00274                 putsUART(xPLMsgKey);
00275 
00276                 if (TheZone == 99 )
00277                         putrsUART((ROM char*)" Panic Alarm");
00278                 else {
00279                         putrsUART((ROM char*)"ZoneAlarmType: ");
00280                         itoa(ZoneConfig[TheZone].ZoneAlarmType, xPLMsgKey);
00281                         putsUART(xPLMsgKey);
00282                         putrsUART((ROM char*)"Text: ");
00283                         putrsUART(AlarmTypesText[iCount]);
00284                 }
00285                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"\r\n");
00286 
00287 
00288 #endif
00289 
00290 
00291                 // Jobs not over until you have wiped and flushed
00292                 UDPFlush();
00293         } // UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)
00294 
00295 } // SendAlarmingMsg

00297 /*********************************************************************
00298  Function:        SendGatewayInfo
00299  PreCondition:    None
00300  Input:           None
00301  Output:          None
00302  Side Effects:    None
00303  Overview:
00304  /// Create and send the xPL message for gateway info
00305  ********************************************************************/
00306 void SendGatewayInfo (void) {
00307 
00308         //Check if we have a MAC transmit port, if not then shit yourself
00309         if (!UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)) {
00310 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00311                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"#ERROR# SendGatewayInfo, no MAC transmit port\r\n");
00312 #endif
00313         }
00314         else {
00315 
00316                 //Generate xPL head with type security.gateway
00317                 XPLSendHeader(xPL_STATUS, TRUE,Class_Security,Type_Gateinfo);
00318                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "protocol=xPL\n");
00319                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "description=Alarm system designed for Home Automation\n");
00320                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "version=Alpha release\n");
00321                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "author=Jarrod Neven\n");
00322                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "info-url=www.neven.info\n");
00323                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "zone-count=");
00324                 itoa(ZONECOUNT, xPLMsgKey);
00325                 UDPPutArray(xPLMsgKey,strlen(xPLMsgKey));
00326                 UDPPut('\n');
00327                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "area-count=");
00328                 itoa(AREACOUNT, xPLMsgKey);
00329                 UDPPutArray(xPLMsgKey,strlen(xPLMsgKey));
00330                 UDPPut('\n');
00331                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "gateway-commands=arm|arm-home|arm-away|arm-latchkey|disarm|panic|isolate|bypass|enable\n");
00332                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "zone-commands=arm|isolate|bypass|enable\n");
00333                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "area-commands=arm,isolate,bypass,enable\n");
00334 
00335                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "}\n");
00336 
00337                 // Now transmit it.
00338                 UDPFlush();
00339 
00340 
00341 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00342                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"SendGatewayInfo Message Sent\r\n");
00343 #endif
00344 
00345         } // UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)
00346 
00347 
00348 } //SendGatewayInfo

00386 /*********************************************************************
00387  Function:        SendArmed
00388  PreCondition:    None
00389  Input:           None
00390  Output:          None
00391  Side Effects:    None
00392  Overview:
00393  /// Create and send the xPL message for when the alarm is armed
00394  ********************************************************************/
00395 void SendArmed (void) {
00396 
00397         BOOL isFirst;
00398         char TempVal[3];
00399 
00400         //Check if we have a MAC transmit port, if not then shit yourself
00401         if (!UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)) {
00402 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00403                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"#ERROR# SendArmed, no MAC transmit port\r\n");
00404 #endif
00405         }
00406         else {
00407                 //security.gateway
00408                 XPLSendHeader(xPL_STATUS, TRUE,Class_Security,Type_Gateway);
00409                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "event=armed\n");
00410 
00411                 // Zone list
00412                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "zone-list=");
00413                 isFirst = TRUE;
00414                 for (iCount = 0; iCount < ZONECOUNT; iCount++) {
00415                         if(ZoneConfig[iCount].IsArmed == TRUE) {
00416                                 if (!isFirst) UDPPut(',');
00417                                 isFirst = FALSE;
00418                                 itoa(iCount, TempVal);
00419                                 UDPPutArray(TempVal,strlen(TempVal));
00420                         }// isArmed
00421                 }// for iCount
00422                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\n");
00423 
00424                 // area list
00425                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "area-list=");
00426                 isFirst = TRUE;
00427                 for (iCount = 0; iCount < AREACOUNT; iCount++) {
00428                         if(AreaConfig[iCount].IsArmed == TRUE) {
00429                                 if (!isFirst) UDPPut(',');
00430                                 isFirst = FALSE;
00431                                 itoa(iCount, TempVal);
00432                                 UDPPutArray(TempVal,strlen(TempVal));
00433                         }// isArmed
00434                 }// for iCount
00435                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\n");
00436 
00437 
00438                 if (UserID[0] != '\0') {
00439                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "user=");
00440                         UDPPutString(UserID);
00441                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\n");
00442                 }
00443 
00444                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "}\n");
00445 
00446 
00447                 // Now transmit it.
00448                 UDPFlush();
00449 
00450                 // no more need for UserID to be populated
00451                 memset(UserID,'\0',USERNAMELENGTH);
00452 
00453 
00454 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00455                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"SendArmed Message Sent\r\n");
00456 #endif
00457 
00458 
00459         } //UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)
00460 } // SendArmed
00461 
00462 /*********************************************************************

00466  Output:          None
00467  Side Effects:    None
00468  Overview:
00469  /// Create and send the xPL message to communicate error events
00470  ********************************************************************/
00471 void SendError (rom char * ErrorMessage) {
00472 
00473         //Check if we have a MAC transmit port, if not then shit yourself
00474         if (!UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)) {
00475 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00476                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"#ERROR# SendError, no MAC transmit port\r\n");
00477 #endif
00478         }
00479         else {
00480                 //security.gateway
00481                 XPLSendHeader(xPL_STATUS, TRUE,Class_Security,Type_Gateway);
00482                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "event=error");
00483                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "error=");
00484 
00485                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) ErrorMessage);
00486 
00487                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\n}\n");
00488 
00489                 // Now transmit it.
00490                 UDPFlush();
00491 
00492         } //UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)

00619 /*********************************************************************
00620  Function:        SendZoneInfo
00621  PreCondition:    None
00622  Input:           ZoneID
00623  Output:          None
00624  Side Effects:    None
00625  Overview:
00626  /// Create and send the xPL message of Zone Info
00627  ********************************************************************/
00628 /*
00629  security.zoneinfo
00630  zone=id
00631  zone-type= determine the zone type and translate it to text from the bit map
00632  alarm-type= determine the alarm type and translate to text from the zone bit map
00633  area-count= count of the areas listed in the zone bit map
00634  area-list= list all of the areas in the zone bit map
00635  */
00636 
00637 void SendZoneInfo (int TheZone) {
00638 
00639         int short iTotal;
00640         BOOL isFirstZone = TRUE;
00641 
00642         //Check if we have a MAC transmit port, if not then shit yourself
00643         if (!UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)) {
00644 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00645                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"#ERROR# SendZoneInfo, no MAC transmit port\r\n");
00646 #endif
00647         }
00648         else {
00649                 //security.gateway
00650                 XPLSendHeader(xPL_STATUS, TRUE,Class_Security,Type_Zoneinfo);
00651                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "zone=");
00652                 itoa(TheZone, xPLMsgKey);
00653                 UDPPutArray(xPLMsgKey,strlen(xPLMsgKey));
00654                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\nzone-type=");
00655                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) ZoneTypesText[ZoneConfig[TheZone].ZoneType]);
00656                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\nalarm-type=");
00657                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) AlarmTypesText[ZoneConfig[TheZone].ZoneAlarmType]);
00658                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\narea-list=");
00659 
00660                 iTotal = 0;
00661                 for (iCount = 0; iCount < AREACOUNT; iCount++) {
00662                         if (isZoneMemberOfArea(TheZone, iCount) == TRUE) {
00663                                 if (!isFirstZone) UDPPut(',');
00664                                 isFirstZone = FALSE;
00665                                 UDPPut('0'+ iCount);
00666                                 iTotal++;
00667                         } // isZoneMemberOfArea(TheZone, iCount)
00668                 }// for iCount
00669 
00670                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\narea-count=");
00671                 itoa(iTotal, xPLMsgKey);
00672                 UDPPutArray(xPLMsgKey,strlen(xPLMsgKey));
00673 
00674                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\nroom=");
00675 
00676                 iCount = EEDATASTART_DEVICEDESC;
00677                 if (TheZone != 0)
00678                         iCount += ((int)TheZone * DEVICEDESCLENGTH) + 1;
00679 
00680                 XEEReadArray ((DWORD) iCount, xPLMsgKey , (BYTE) DEVICEDESCLENGTH);
00681                 TCPPutArray(sktHTTP, xPLMsgKey, DEVICEDESCLENGTH);
00682 
00683                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\n}\n");
00684 
00685                 // Now transmit it.
00686                 UDPFlush();
00687 
00688         }//UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)
00689 
00690 } // SendZoneInfo
00691 
00692 
00693 /*********************************************************************
00694  Function:        SendAreaInfo
00695  PreCondition:    None
00696  Input:           AreaID
00697  Output:          None
00698  Side Effects:    None
00699  Overview:
00700  /// Create and send the xPL message of Area Info
00701  ********************************************************************/
00702 
00703 /*
00704  security.areainfo
00705 
00706  area=id
00707  zone-count= a count of the zones that are listed in this area
00708  zone-list= list of zones in this area
00709  */
00710 
00711 void SendAreaInfo (int TheArea) {
00712 
00713         int short iTotal;
00714         BOOL isFirstZone = TRUE;
00715 
00716         //Check if we have a MAC transmit port, if not then shit yourself
00717         if (!UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)) {
00718 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
00719                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"#ERROR# SendAreaInfo, no MAC transmit port\r\n");
00720 #endif
00721         }
00722         else {
00723                 //security.gateway
00724                 XPLSendHeader(xPL_STATUS, TRUE,Class_Security,Type_Areainfo);
00725                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "area=");
00726                 UDPPut('0'+ TheArea);
00727                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\nzone-list=");
00728 
00729                 iTotal = 0;
00730                 for (iCount = 0; iCount < ZONECOUNT; iCount++) {
00731                         if (isZoneMemberOfArea(iCount, TheArea) == TRUE) {
00732                                 if (!isFirstZone) UDPPut(',');
00733                                 isFirstZone = FALSE;
00734                                 itoa(iCount, xPLMsgKey);
00735                                 UDPPutArray(xPLMsgKey,strlen(xPLMsgKey));
00736                                 iTotal++;
00737                         } // ZoneConfig
00738                 }// for iCount
00739 
00740                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\nzone-count=");
00741                 itoa(iTotal, xPLMsgKey);
00742                 UDPPutArray(xPLMsgKey,strlen(xPLMsgKey));
00743 
00744                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\nroom=");
00745 
00746                 iCount = (int)EEDATASTART_DEVICEDESC + ((int)DEVICEDESCLENGTH * (int)ZONECOUNT) + 1;
00747                 if (TheArea != 0)
00748                         iCount += (int)TheArea * (int)DEVICEDESCLENGTH ;
00749 
00750                 XEEReadArray ((DWORD) iCount, xPLMsgKey , (BYTE) DEVICEDESCLENGTH);
00751                 TCPPutArray(sktHTTP, xPLMsgKey, DEVICEDESCLENGTH);
00752 
00753                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "}\n");
00754 
00755                 // Now transmit it.
00756                 UDPFlush();
00757 
00758         }//UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)
00759 
00760 } // SendAreaInfo

00809  Side Effects:    None

00828                         UDPPut(xPLConfig.xPL_My_Instance_ID[iCount]);
00829                 }

00831 
00832                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "interval=");
00833                 memset(xPLMsgKey,'\0',xPLMSGKEYLENGTH);
00834                 uitoa((WORD)xPLConfig.xPL_Heartbeat_Interval, xPLMsgKey);
00835                 UDPPutString(xPLMsgKey);
00836                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\n");
00837 
00838                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "ip=");
00839                 SendIPValue(AppConfig.MyIPAddr);
00840                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\n");
00841 
00842                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "subnet=");
00843                 SendIPValue(AppConfig.MyMask);
00844                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\n");
00845 
00846 
00847                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "}\n");
00848 
00849                 // Now transmit it.
00850                 UDPFlush();
00851 
00852 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)

00861 /*********************************************************************
00862  Function:        SendIPValue
00863  PreCondition:    XPLSendHeader must have been called
00864  Input:           None
00865  Output:          UDP data
00866  Side Effects:    None
00867  Overview:
00868  /// Sends the string value of an IP address to the UDP output buffer
00869  ********************************************************************/
00870 
00871 void SendIPValue(IP_ADDR IPVal) {
00872     BYTE IPDigit[4];
00873         BYTE i;
00874 
00875         for(i = 0; i < sizeof(IP_ADDR); i++) {
00876             uitoa((WORD)IPVal.v[i], IPDigit);
00877                 UDPPutString(IPDigit);
00878                 if(i == sizeof(IP_ADDR)-1)
00879                         break;
00880                 UDPPutROMString((ROM char *)".");
00881         }
00882 
00883 } // SendIPValue

00993 /*********************************************************************
00994  Function:        SendGateStat
00995  PreCondition:    None
00996  Input:           None
00997  Output:          UDP data
00998  Side Effects:    None
00999  Overview:
01000  /// Send the xpl message relating to the state of the gateway
01001  ********************************************************************/
01002 void SendGateStat (void) {
01003 
01004         char TempVal[3];
01005         BOOL isFirstArea;
01006 
01007         //Check if we have a MAC transmit port, if not then shit yourself
01008         if (!UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)) {
01009 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
01010                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"#ERROR# SendGateStat, no MAC transmit port\r\n");
01011 #endif
01012         }
01013         else {
01014                 //security.gateway
01015                 XPLSendHeader(xPL_STATUS, TRUE,Class_Config,Type_Gatestat);
01016 
01017                 // AC power state
01018                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "ac-fail=");
01019                 if (BatteryState == Battery_InUse)
01020                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "true\n");
01021                 else
01022                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "false\n");
01023 
01024                 // internal battery state
01025                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "low-battery=");
01026                 if (VoltageBattery <  (unsigned int) BATTERY_LOW)
01027                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "true\n");
01028                 else
01029                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "false\n");
01030 
01031                 // Alarm state
01032                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "status=");
01033                 if ((AlarmState == Armed) || (AlarmState == Armed_LatchKey) )
01034                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "armed\n");
01035                 else if ( AlarmState == Disarmed)
01036                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "disarmed\n");
01037                 else { // must be in an alarming state
01038                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "alarm\n");
01039                         uitoa(LastZoneAlarmed,  TempVal);
01040                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "zone-list=");
01041                         UDPPutString(xPLMsgKey);
01042                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\n");
01043                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "area-list=");
01044 
01045                         isFirstArea = TRUE;
01046                         for (iCount = 0; iCount < AREACOUNT; iCount++) {
01047                                 if (isZoneMemberOfArea(LastZoneAlarmed, iCount) == TRUE) {
01048                                         if (!isFirstArea) UDPPut(',');
01049                                         isFirstArea = FALSE;
01050                                         UDPPut('0'+iCount);
01051                                 }// isZoneMemberOfArea
01052                         }// for iCount
01053 
01054                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\n");
01055                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "alarm-type=");
01056                         UDPPutROMString(AlarmTypesText[ZoneConfig[LastZoneAlarmed].ZoneAlarmType]);
01057                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\n");
01058                 }// alarm state
01059 
01060                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "}\n");
01061                 // Now transmit it.
01062                 UDPFlush();
01063 
01064 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
01065                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"SendGateStat sent");
01066 #endif
01067 
01068         }//UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)
01069 
01070 
01071 } //SendGateStat
01072

01075 /*********************************************************************
01076  Function:        SendAreaStat
01077  PreCondition:    None
01078  Input:           Area ID
01079  Output:          UDP data
01080  Side Effects:    None
01081  Overview:
01082 /// Send the xpl message relating to the state of the area
01083  ********************************************************************/
01084 void SendAreaStat (int TheArea) {
01085 
01086 
01087         //Check if we have a MAC transmit port, if not then shit yourself
01088         if (!UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)) {
01089 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
01090                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"#ERROR# SendAreaStat, no MAC transmit port\r\n");
01091 #endif
01092         }
01093         else {
01094                 //security.gateway
01095                 XPLSendHeader(xPL_STATUS, TRUE,Class_Config,Type_Areastat);
01096 
01097                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "area=");
01098                 UDPPut('0'+ TheArea);
01099 
01100                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\narmed=");
01101                 if(AreaConfig[TheArea].IsArmed == TRUE)
01102                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "true");
01103                 else
01104                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "false");
01105 
01106                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\nalert=");
01107                 if(AreaConfig[TheArea].IsTriggered == TRUE)
01108                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "true");
01109                 else
01110                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "false");
01111 
01112                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\nalarm=");
01113                 if(AreaConfig[TheArea].IsAlarmed == TRUE) {
01114 
01115                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "true\nalarm-type=");
01116                         UDPPutROMString(AlarmTypesText[AreaConfig[TheArea].ZoneAlarmType]);
01117 
01118                         i2Count =0;
01119                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\nalarm-zones=");
01120                         for (iCount = 0; iCount < ZONECOUNT; iCount++) {
01121                                 if (isZoneMemberOfArea(iCount, TheArea) == TRUE) {
01122                                         if (i2Count != 0) UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) ",");
01123                                         i2Count = 1;
01124                                         memset(xPLMsgKey,'\0',xPLMSGKEYLENGTH);
01125                                         uitoa(iCount,  xPLMsgKey);
01126                                         UDPPutString(xPLMsgKey);
01127                                 }// isZoneMemberOfArea
01128                         }// for
01129                 }//     IsAlarmed == TRUE
01130 
01131 
01132                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\ntamper=");
01133                 if(AreaConfig[TheArea].IsTampered == TRUE)
01134                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "true");
01135                 else
01136                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "false");
01137 
01138 
01139                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\nisolated=");
01140                 if(AreaConfig[TheArea].IsIsolated == TRUE)
01141                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "true");
01142                 else
01143                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "false");
01144 
01145 
01146                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\nbypassed=");
01147                 if(AreaConfig[TheArea].IsBypassed == TRUE)
01148                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "true");
01149                 else
01150                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "false");
01151 
01152 
01153                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\n}\n");
01154 
01155                 // Now transmit it.
01156                 UDPFlush();
01157 
01158 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
01159                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"SendAreaStat sent");
01160 #endif
01161 
01162         }//UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)

01171 /*********************************************************************
01172  Function:        SendZoneStat
01173  PreCondition:    None
01174  Input:           Area ID
01175  Output:          UDP data
01176  Side Effects:    None
01177  Overview:
01178  /// Send the xpl message relating to the state of the area
01179  ********************************************************************/
01180 void SendZoneStat (int TheZone) {
01181 
01182 
01183         char TempVal[3];
01184 
01185         //Check if we have a MAC transmit port, if not then shit yourself
01186         if (!UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)) {
01187 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
01188                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"#ERROR# SendZoneStat, no MAC transmit port\r\n");
01189 #endif
01190         }
01191         else {
01192                 //security.gateway
01193                 XPLSendHeader(xPL_STATUS, TRUE,Class_Config,Type_Areastat);                     
01194 
01195                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "zone=");
01196                 uitoa(TheZone,  TempVal);
01197                 UDPPut((char *)TempVal);
01198 
01199                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\narmed=");
01200                 if(ZoneConfig[TheZone].IsArmed == TRUE)
01201                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "true");
01202                 else
01203                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "false");
01204 
01205                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\nalert=");
01206                 if(ZoneConfig[TheZone].IsTriggered == TRUE)
01207                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "true");
01208                 else
01209                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "false");
01210 
01211                 //state
01212                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\nstate=");
01213                 if (ZoneConfig[TheZone].IsIsolated) 
01214                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "isolated");
01215                 else if (ZoneConfig[TheZone].IsBypassed) 
01216                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "bypassed");
01217                 else 
01218                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "enabled");
01219 
01220 
01221                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\nalarm=");
01222                 if(ZoneConfig[TheZone].IsAlarmed == TRUE) {
01223 
01224                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "true\nalarm-type=");
01225                         UDPPutROMString(AlarmTypesText[ZoneConfig[TheZone].ZoneAlarmType]);
01226                 }//     IsAlarmed == TRUE
01227 
01228                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\ntamper=");
01229                 if(ZoneConfig[TheZone].IsTampered == TRUE)
01230                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "true");
01231                 else
01232                         UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "false");
01233 
01234 
01235                 UDPPutROMString((ROM BYTE*) "\n}\n");
01236 
01237                 // Now transmit it.
01238                 UDPFlush();
01239 
01240 #if defined(DEBUG_UART)
01241                 putrsUART((ROM char*)"SendZoneStat sent");
01242 #endif
01243 
01244         }//UDPIsPutReady(XPLSocket)
01245 
01246 
01247 } //SendGateStat
